report.title: To the Land of the Wize
report.author: DemonXstreeM
report.bodytext: The White Horse man..... thats what I found.... and I road it through the fields of poppies. /n /n The Pull /n The Push /n The Rush /n /n And upon a dream I floated away, my thoughts fading to gray. /n To the Land of Nod thus I sway, forever more my thoughts there lay.
